subScenes.name: 初次打招呼
subScenes.description: 新邻居在楼道偶遇，互相问候

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! You're the new neighbor, right?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！你是新搬来的邻居吧？

responses.text: Yeah, I just moved in last week. Nice to meet you!
responses.text_cn: 对，我上周刚搬来，很高兴认识你！

responses.text: Yes, I am. I'm Alex. Hope I'm not being too noisy!
responses.text_cn: 是的，我是亚历克斯，希望我没打扰到你。

responses.text: Yep!
responses.text_cn: 对。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气开场，拉近距离

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm Lisa. Welcome to the building!

responses.text: Thanks, Lisa! I'm really excited to be here.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢丽莎！我超期待住这儿的。

responses.text: Appreciate it! I'm Ben.
responses.text_cn: 太感谢了！我是本。

responses.text: Cool, thanks!
responses.text_cn: 好的，谢谢！

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应时加上名字，显得更亲切

subScenes.name: 询问垃圾处理
subScenes.description: 询问小区垃圾投放时间和规则

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, do you know when trash day is around here?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嘿，你知道这儿的垃圾日是哪天吗？

responses.text: It's Thursday nights—put bins out by 7 p.m. Don't forget to rinse them!
responses.text_cn: 周四晚上，七点前放出来，记得冲洗一下。

responses.text: I'm not sure, but I can check with the manager tomorrow.
responses.text_cn: 我不太确定，明天问下物业。

responses.text: Thursday!
responses.text_cn: 周四！

qaPairs.usageNote: 问具体时间+细节，实用性强

qaPairs.speakerText: Oh, and do they recycle plastics here?

responses.text: Yep, blue bin next to the main trash—just sort it!
responses.text_cn: 收的，蓝色桶在主垃圾桶旁，分好就行。

responses.text: I think so, but I don't do recycling myself.
responses.text_cn: 好像收，但我自己不回收。

responses.text: Blue bin.
responses.text_cn: 蓝色桶。

qaPairs.usageNote: 简短回答也OK，但完整版更友好

subScenes.name: 打听超市位置
subScenes.description: 询问附近买菜或日用品的超市

qaPairs.speakerText: Is there a grocery store nearby? I need to stock up.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 附近有超市吗？我得买点东西。

responses.text: Yeah, there's a 24/7 market two blocks down—super convenient!
responses.text_cn: 有，两个街区外有家24小时超市，超方便！

responses.text: Not sure, but there's a mini-mart on the corner.
responses.text_cn: 不太确定，拐角有家小便利店。

responses.text: Down the street.
responses.text_cn: 街那头。

qaPairs.usageNote: 优先回答具体距离和特点

qaPairs.speakerText: Any good fruit stalls? I hate pre-packaged stuff.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 有卖新鲜水果的摊位吗？我不喜欢预包装的。

responses.text: There's a farmer's market every Saturday morning—best avocados in town!
responses.text_cn: 每周六早上有农贸市场，牛油果最棒！

responses.text: Not really, but the store has decent apples.
responses.text_cn: 没专门摊位，但超市苹果还行。

responses.text: Saturday market.
responses.text_cn: 周六市场。

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达偏好能引发更实用推荐

subScenes.name: 礼貌告别
subScenes.description: 结束对话，为下次见面留余地

qaPairs.speakerText: Well, I should get going—I've got a meeting in 10.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我得走了，10分钟后有个会。

responses.text: No problem! Let me know if you need help with anything.
responses.text_cn: 没问题！有事随时找我。

responses.text: Catch you later!
responses.text_cn: 回头见！

responses.text: Thanks, bye!
responses.text_cn: 谢谢，拜拜！

qaPairs.usageNote: 告别时主动提供帮助更显友好

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm heading to the market now—want me to grab you anything?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我正要去超市，要帮你带点什么吗？

responses.text: Aw, that's so kind! Maybe milk? I'll owe you one!
responses.text_cn: 太贴心了！能帮我带瓶牛奶吗？我请你！

responses.text: Nah, I'm good, thanks!
responses.text_cn: 不用了，谢谢！

responses.text: Sure, milk please!
responses.text_cn: 好啊，带瓶牛奶。

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提议帮带物，促进邻里互动
